text:
Rehearsal of a Dark Plan

A dim, narrow staircase; tension fills the air.  
His heart races with every step.  
Young man: “What if I actually go through with it?”  

---

Fourth floor; porters move furniture, blocking the way.  
He recognizes the flat's former tenant.  
Young man: “Good, it’s empty. Just her.”  
Young man: “Time to ring the bell.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The young man nervously approaches the old woman's flat, feeling increasingly anxious about his intentions.
